title: Yella Grille
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chef-owned and billed as a Modern Mediterranean grill. Menu marks the dairy-free and gluten-free items. Items that are vegan suitable are grape leaves, falafel, and a few salads. Kitchen will try to accommodate special diet requests. Main entree prices are more expensive than the salads, smalls, and sides.
